Templates

Mini-hub item

Example

Open this example in new window

HTML

<main class="page page--rightbar" id="maincontent" role="main">
  <div class="page__header">
    <div class="nhsuk-width-container">
      [ PAGE_GOBACK ]
      <h1>[ PAGE_TITLE ]</h1>
      <span class="nhsuk-caption-xl">[ PAGE_CAPTION ]</span>
      <p class="nhsuk-lede-text">[ PAGE_SUMMARY ]</p>
      [ PUBLISHED_INFO ]
      [ TAXONOMIES ]
      [ MINIHUB_LIST ]
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="page__layout nhsuk-width-container">
    <div class="page__main">
      <div class="page__content">
        [ CONTENT--MAIN_BLOCKS ]
      </div>
    </div>
    <aside class="page__rightbar">
      [ CONTENT--SIDEBAR_BLOCKS ]
    </aside>
  </div>
  <div class="page__footer">
    [ PAGE_LASTUPDATED ]
    [ MINIHUB_PAGINATION ]
  </div>
  <section class="page__feature">
    [ CONTENT--FEATURED_BLOCKS ]
  </section>
</main>
